theorem putnam_1983_a4
(k m : ℕ)
(S : ℤ)
(kpos : k > 0)
(hm : m = 6 * k - 1)
(hS : S = ∑ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose m (3 * j - 1))
: (S ≠ 0) := by
  subst_vars
  have h₁ : ∀ k : ℕ, k > 0 → ∑ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) ≠ 0 := by
    intro k hk
    have h₁ : ∑ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) ≠ 0 := by
      have h₂ : ∑ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) = ∑ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) := rfl
      rw [h₂]
      -- Use the fact that the sum is not zero due to the properties of binomial coefficients and alternating signs.
      apply Nat.ne_of_gt
      have h₃ : ∑ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) > 0 := by
        have h₄ : ∀ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) ≥ 0 := by
          intro j hj
          have h₅ : (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) ≥ 0 := by
            cases' Nat.even_or_odd j with h h <;> simp_all [pow_add, pow_mul, Nat.even_iff, Nat.odd_iff, Nat.choose_eq_factorial_div_factorial]
            <;> positivity
          exact h₅
        have h₆ : ∑ j ∈ Finset.Icc 1 (2 * k - 1), (-1 : ℤ) ^ (j + 1) * choose (6 * k - 1) (3 * j - 1) > 0 := by
          apply Finset.sum_pos
          exact fun j hj => by linarith [h₄ j hj]
          exact ⟨1, by
            simp_all [Finset.mem_Icc]
            <;> omega⟩
        exact h₆
      linarith
    exact h₁
  exact h₁ k kpos
